评论概述: Perfect for business casual office attire
评论详情: The COOFANDY Men’s Knit Polo Shirt is a stylish and comfortable addition to any wardrobe. Whether I’m heading to the office, a casual outing, or a dinner date, this shirt strikes the perfect balance between classy and relaxed.  Pros: 1. Soft and Comfortable Fabric: The knit material feels incredibly soft against the skin and provides excellent breathability. It’s perfect for all-day wear without feeling heavy or restrictive. 2. Elegant Design: The subtle knit texture and well-crafted collar give the shirt a polished and modern look. It’s a great choice for dressing up or down. 3. Perfect Fit: The shirt fits true to size with a flattering, tailored cut. It’s neither too tight nor too loose—just the right amount of stretch for mobility and comfort. 4. Versatile Style: This long-sleeve polo pairs effortlessly with jeans, chinos, or slacks, making it suitable for a variety of occasions. 5. Durable Quality: The material holds up well after multiple washes without fading, shrinking, or losing its shape.  Cons: None so far—it’s a fantastic shirt!  The COOFANDY Men’s Knit Polo Shirt combines style, comfort, and versatility into one exceptional product. It’s a must-have for anyone looking to elevate their casual wear while staying comfortable. Highly recommended!

评论概述: Garment was received with deep creases in fabric.
评论详情: "Machine wash" did not relax creases caused by production or shipping. Garment care label does not allow tumble dry. Press sheet ironing was neither expected nor acceptable to me. Confusingly, the product page on Amazon had both US sizes in body text, and an incorrect image that showed Asian sizes in centimeters. The garment received was indeed sized US medium. Sad for me because in all other ways the garment is as advertised and as desired.

If you are a tall person, you do not buy. If you need clothes to be an actual size, do not buy if you are a short person this may work.  But overall, the shirt, material are great, but it will not make One wash Before it becomes a medium.

5’11” 180, athletic build, large. Short version: As good as any of my pricier tops. Premium quality, got a lot of compliments; I highly recommend. Long version: My first time wearing it was in these engagement photos from 7 months ago. I’ve worn and washed it 10x or so, yet the material still feels and looks exactly like these photos. The integrity and elasticity of the collar hasn’t changed at all, which I was very impressed with. I haven’t experienced any loose strings from snags, which seems to be the result of well-crafted, premium quality material - especially for the price. The heavy fabric keeps you warm, looks great, and prevents excessive wrinkles. Highly recommended.
